DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To assess effectiveness ISD ( Insulin sensitize drug ) Vs OCP ( Combined E & P cyproterone acetate ) improve clinical , hormonal metabolic feature PCOS ( polycystic ovary syndrome ) woman India . Intervention : Randomized receive Metformin 1500 mg / day OR OCP ( EE+CA ) Life style advice woman BMI ( body mass index ) 28 , group ( PS : progesterone add get withdrawal bleed amenorrhoea two month , prolong menstrual bleeding . ) Study period : 6 month Clinical evaluation point test enrollment 6 month . Clinical : BMI , Waist circumference , Hip circumference , Acne score , FG ( modify Ferriman Gallwey score ) ( epilation last 6 week ) , Menstrual History Biochemical : Thyroid function test , Prolactin , Total Testosterone , Lipid Profile , FAsting blood sugar & 75 gm 2 hr Glucose tolerance test ( GTT ) , Sr Insulin , 25- hydroxy vitamin D ( optional ) , ( Only Radioimmunoassay / Chemiluminescence assay ) Acronyms : OCP ( oral contraceptive pill ) ; PCOS ( polycystic ovary syndrome ) ; FBS ( fast blood sugar ) ; GTT ( glucose tolerance test )
DOC.brief_title: OCP v Metformin Improvement Clinical Symptoms Metabolic Markers Indian PCOS Women
DOC.criteria: PCOS Women diagnose Rotterdam criterion Age > 16 menarche least 2 yr upto age 40 . Diagnosed Rotterdam Anovulation F.G . Score ≥ 8 Total testosterone ≥ 40 ngms/dl ovarian volume ≥ 10 cc BMI > 23 Women attempt pregnancy present . PCOS Women BMI ≤ 23 Undergoing treatment acne hirsutism .
